title: AI Adoption Rate Across US Companies by 2027
description: Projected percentage of US companies with 50+ employees that have deployed AI in production workflows by 2027.

sources.title: The State of AI in 2023: Generative AI's Breakout Year
sources.excerpt: One-third of respondents say their organizations are using gen AI regularly in at least one business function. AI adoption overall at 55% of survey respondents.

sources.title: Business Trends and Outlook Survey: AI Module Q3 2023
sources.excerpt: 3.8% of US firms reported using AI in production. An additional 6.4% were in testing/pilot phase. Adoption highest in information (18%) and professional services (12%).

sources.title: The State of AI in Early 2024
sources.excerpt: 72% of organizations surveyed now use AI in at least one function, up from 55% the prior year. Generative AI adoption doubled.

sources.title: Business Trends and Outlook Survey: AI Module Q2 2024
sources.excerpt: AI usage among US firms rose to 6.6%, with an additional 9.1% in testing. Information sector at 24%, finance/insurance at 15%.

sources.title: State of Generative AI in the Enterprise Q3 2024
sources.excerpt: 79% of enterprise leaders expect gen AI to transform their industry within 3 years. 42% have gen AI in production, up from 22% a year earlier.

sources.title: The State of AI in 2025
sources.excerpt: AI is now a core part of business strategy for 78% of respondents. 65% report measurable revenue or cost impact from AI deployments.

sources.title: AI adoption hits tipping point as majority of firms deploy
Business Trends and Outlook Survey: AI Module Q2 2025
sources.excerpt: US firm AI usage in production reached 10.2%, with 14.8% in testing. Large firms (500+ employees) at 28%. Adoption accelerating across all sectors.

sources.title: Microsoft 2024 10-K — AI and Cloud Revenue
sources.excerpt: Azure AI services revenue grew 60% YoY. Over 53,000 organizations now use Azure OpenAI service, up from 11,000 a year earlier.

sources.title: Salesforce 2024 10-K — Einstein AI Adoption
sources.excerpt: Over 1 trillion AI predictions served per week via Einstein. 68% of enterprise customers have enabled at least one AI feature.

sources.title: The Anthropic Economic Index: Measuring AI's Real-World Impact
sources.excerpt: Census Bureau rigorous measure finds 9.7% of firms actively using AI, while broader surveys report 78%. Adoption gap driven by definitional differences in what counts as AI use.

sources.title: Stanford AI Index Report 2025
sources.excerpt: 78% of organizations report using AI in at least one business function. Enterprise AI spending grew 45% YoY globally.

sources.title: Microsoft 2025 Global AI Adoption Report
sources.excerpt: 75% of knowledge workers now use AI tools. Adoption in enterprises with 500+ employees reached 60%, up from 40% a year prior.
